Copy

```
curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/platform/api/v1/users/{id} \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "name": "Daniel",
  "display_name": "Dan",
  "email": "daniel@acme.inc",
  "password": "Password2!",
  "custom_attributes": {}
}'
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/users/update-a-user#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by the system admin after creating a platformApp. This token should be used to provision agent bots, accounts, users and their roles.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/users/update-a-user#parameter-id)

id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the user on the platform

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/users/update-a-user#body-name)

name

string

Name of the user

Example:

`"Daniel"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/users/update-a-user#body-display-name)

display\_name

string

Display name of the user

Example:

`"Dan"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/users/update-a-user#body-email)

email

string

Email of the user

Example:

`"daniel@acme.inc"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/users/update-a-user#body-password)

password

string

Password must contain uppercase, lowercase letters, number and a special character

Example:

`"Password2!"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/users/update-a-user#body-custom-attributes)

custom\_attributes

object

Custom attributes you want to associate with the user

Example:

```
{}
```
